doc:
Nicholas Gleaves https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nicholas_Gleaves 0 Nicholas Gleaves is an English actor and playwright. Originally from the Halliwell area of Bolton, Lancashire, England he attended Sharples School from 1980-85. After completing his schooling his mother made him attend a play and this sparked his interest in acting. He is a fan of the Smiths and long time supporter of Bolton Wanderers. He is married to Lesley Sharp. They have two sons and reside in London. Nicholas_Gleaves is an_English_actor_and_playwright .
